text: John Francis Harcourt Baring, 7th Baron Ashburton, (2 November 1928 â€“ 6 October 2020), was a British merchant banker. He was chairman of British Petroleum (BP). Lord Ashburton also sat on the boards of Jaguar Cars, Dunlop Rubber and Royal Insurance. Lord Ashburton died at his home on 6 October 2020 at the age of 91. ==References== Category:1928 births Category:2020 deaths Category:British bankers
title: John Baring, 7th Baron Ashburton
